posts.post_content:
Hi,

I'm looking to pick up a couple of T206 Zack Wheat cards - graded would be preferred but raw considered as well.  Something in the 2-4 range would be best.

I'll consider any backs, and would pay in line with VCP averages for the respective backs (assuming eye appeal is in line with the grade as well).  I can go overpay on eBay if I wanted to, but that's not my intent.

Shoot me a PM if you may have any you're looking to sell.

Thanks!
Scott
